elementMetadata.description: Add a SalesLoft Instance to connect your existing SalesLoft account to the CRM Hub, allowing you to manage customers, companies, activities etc. across multiple CRM Elements. You will need your SalesLoft account information to add an instance.
elementMetadata.name: salesloft-custom

configuration.description: Enables use of global fields query parameter to filter response to only specified fields. This will override any existing vendor functionality on the connector
configuration.name: Allow Select Fields parameter

configuration.description: SalesLoft Custom Clone OAuth basic header
configuration.name: OAuth basic header

configuration.description: Generic map used to specify default fields for bulk download and GET /all requests. Each key should be the canonical objectName and values may be specified as a comma-delimited string or a list of strings
configuration.name: Default select fields

configuration.description: Used to enable/disable filtering of null values from the responses
configuration.name: Filter null values from the response

configuration.description: Set time interval for polling application (in minutes)
configuration.name: Event poller refresh interval

configuration.description: Event Poller Resources Configuration. The configuration is defined via JSON, an example of which is as follows - { "contacts": { "url": "/hubs/helpdesk/contacts", “idField”: “user.id”, “datesConfiguration”: { "updatedDateField": "user.updated_at", "updatedDateFormat": "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssX", “createdDateField”: “user.created_at”, “createdDateFormat": "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssX" }, "pageSize": 10000 } }
configuration.name: Event Poller Resources Configuration

description: Add a SalesLoft Instance to connect your existing SalesLoft account to the CRM Hub, allowing you to manage customers, companies, activities etc. across multiple CRM Elements. You will need your SalesLoft account information to add an instance.

description.x-samplevalue: British school of magic for students

name.x-samplevalue: Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of resources to return in a given page.

parameters.name: returnTotalCount
parameters.description: Return total count in response header

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Specifies the order of the result set, a valid order by query would be: updated_at asc

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The start page for pagination, which always start with 1, if not supplied defaulted to 1

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: The CEQL search expression. The only search fields are id, updated_at and domain. An example would be updated_at > '2018-12-04T05:45:22.430180-05:00'

description.x-samplevalue:
To: "" <grant.powell@salesloft.com>

Subject: Re: Request for whitelisting
Body:

Hey Grant,

Thank you for whitelisting the app!

Regarding opportunities endpoints, I am not sure if the Opps endpoint can be excluded from the scope of integration. If I want to access that end point what are my options?

Also on the api documentation of Salesloft I couldn't see any endpoint for opps.
